channel.title: Neo4j on reorchestrate
channel.description: Recent content in Neo4j on reorchestrate

item.title: A Date Hierarchy for Neo4j
item.description: I wrote this a while ago based on this excellent post and added a few more attributes. Given that Neo4j doesn’t have a datatype to deal with dates it might come in handy for you too. It will generate a calendar between the years specified at the top of the script (1970 to 2050) and create Day vertexes with attributes of year, month, day, dayName (day of week) and workDay (binary).
